document.full_text: a senator on sunday called for a "no-ride list" for amtrak trains after intelligence gleaned from the raid on osama bin laden's compound pointed to potential attacks on the nation's train system.
document.title: sen. schumer proposes "no-ride list" for amtrak trains
lines_and_colors: a senator on sunday called for a "no-ride list" for amtrak trains after intelligence gleaned from the raid on osama bin laden's compound pointed to potential attacks on the nation's train system.
